text:
Hey guys, I could use some input on which feels like the better option for windy grass, I've found 3 that have distinctly different moods:

Option1
<http://www.istockphoto.com/video/lush-grass-3815945?st=d5eb54f>

Option 2
<http://www.istockphoto.com/video/golden-wheat-crops-macro-loopable-34052164?st=a20e9b0>

Option 3
<http://www.istockphoto.com/video/wheat-in-the-breeze-27964070?st=3522038>

attachments.title: Lush grass
attachments.text: Download this Lush grass video now. And search more of the web's best library of royalty-free stock video footage from iStock.

attachments.title: Golden wheat crops macro (loopable)
attachments.text: Download this Golden wheat crops macro (loopable) video now. And search more of the web's best library of royalty-free stock video footage from iStock.

attachments.title: Wheat in the Breeze

text: personally I'd go with #1 or #3. Middle feels too abstract, especially on a watchface
the sky in #1 seems like a decent way of understanding what you're looking at
I agree with that guy ^
Although the full flood of green/yellow in #3 is nice.
agreed with that guy ^
point being - either seem totally fine
Which would the animated icons look better over?
oh you know - #3 might have better field to animate on top of. It's more monotone/less busy
#3 has a rolling wind feel to it, #1 is more swaying, I feel 3 would be less visually disrupting beneath the icon since the movement is more universal rather than laterally across the middle
I agree with that guy ^
let's roll with #3
I vote #3
Cool. Thanks dudes
:rocket:
I'll post the link to basecamp asking for Dave B's :thumbsup: or :thumbsdown:
Perfect. Thanks Trent. You are a real dude.

Hey <@U026E0ZNR>, abes complaining that some of the larger sticker files are taking a long time to load. If i call out a couple of them, do you have time today to generate new sprites for them with a lower framerate?
I think so. Do you know how many of them? I also think I forgot to compress those black stickers too. That may help with the file size a bit.
I'm not sure which ones he's talking about in particular but I'm seeing maybe ~4 that are slower than the others. I'll ask him which ones he'd like to see faster.
Ok great
Well well, we saved quite a bit this time.
ooo
I've replaced all the old ones on the NAS with the compressed ones.
Great thanks! I'll but them in and see what happens.
<@U026E0ZNR> that fixed all the issues I was seeing with the haptic syncing
Awesome!
hope it does for Abe too

Would you still have time to decrease the frame rate for some of the stickers? Namely, the five that are current at 33.33 fps? Their display times are still a bit long and I think it would make the app feel a lot nicer if they were smaller.
Is it a length concern you have? I'm not totally following yet, is this a different issue than the slow loading time that Abe mentioned?

I can change those stickers if we need it. But for some reason I'm a little concerned that changing frame rate on these may be a can-of-worms type of situation and I want to be able to get this wind video done too. I'll do my best, just want to be sure it's necessary before I jump into it.

It appears that the actual size, height in pixels, affects display time, and all the ones at 30+ fps could stand to be cut down. The main offender is soccer01, but I figured if you can it would be nice to optimize the display time for all the stickers that we can.
But if you don't have time, soccer01 is a priority. I can get a build to <@U030TQFR3> and see what he thinks too
Ok cool. I'll get you what I can by EOD and whatever I have left I'll do early tomorrow since these should be the last of my tasks before we deliver.
Yay thanks! If you let me know when soccer01 is done I can push a build to Abe then.
K Jenny, try the file I just posted to the NAS: _soccer_v2_01_sprite_24.png_
16fps appeared to be too slow, but 24fps feels ok to me.
definitely an improvement in display time. i'll push the updates to Abe's develop branch and post to basecamp. Thanks trent!!!
"the soccer sticker with the bunny successfully kicking a goal"
a++++ amazing
:simple_smile:
there's one where his kick gets blocked so i had to be specific
"the soccer sticker with the bunny successfully missing the goal"
Here's a new pass at the wind video watch face. <https://www.dropbox.com/s/l94i9g03fgdo8mr/DigitalWindClock_04.mp4?dl=0>

Lemme know if you guys ( <@U030TQFR3> <@U0265G76F> ) feel good about it and we can shoot it to Dave B. If he feels good about it himself, we can just swap out the test footage with the hi-res footage once we purchase it.
<@U02613K0X> the new sticker sprites at 24fps are all up on NAS now.
woohoo
Yeah! The most life-like framerate.
woot for life-likeness
Hey Ben, do you want to purchase that video clip since Dave B gave the thumbs up? Or is that something I can go download without having a card?
Hey I just saved $25 on <http://iStockphoto.com|iStockphoto.com> with a Retail Me Not coupon. #thrifty
a craving for savings
Hey <@U02613K0X> I just realized I forgot to compress those 24fps sprites again... they are currently compressing. Sorry if that throws you off at all.
haha i was _just_ thinking that
Compress! He's got a craving for savings!!!
<@U026PHQ3J|evans> set the channel topic: Craving for savings
Ok they are goooooood
Nice and small
:small_red_triangle:
no emoji for small
:mag:
jenny jenny jenny. New video for wind up on _Test Renders > Watch Faces â€“ 2.12.15_ with the updated video.
@Jenny is the build you just pushed the final w/ everything?
hi! no not a final build yet i need to get Trent's latest watch face in there
doing that now..
Cool cool.
that is some well-timed grass blowing right there
okey build w/ everything is pushed to GitLab
Yah! Awesome. I'll post another update letting them know it's The Chosen One
